name: Superhero
description: Test your knowledge of the world's mightiest heroes

questions.text: Was Heath Ledger in this movie?
options: He was only in a cameo
questions.explanation: Heath Ledger played the iconic role of the Joker in this movie, winning a posthumous Oscar for his performance.

questions.text: What was the Joker's main motivation in the movie?
questions.explanation: The Joker's main motivation was creating chaos and anarchy in Gotham, as he believed people only act morally when it suits them.

questions.text: What happened to Rachel Dawes at the end?
questions.explanation: Rachel Dawes died in the explosion planned by the Joker, which led Harvey Dent to become Two-Face.
Christopher Nolan directed The Dark Knight, part of his Dark Knight trilogy.

questions.text: What was Harvey Dent's tragic transformation?
options: His face was disfigured in fire
questions.explanation: Harvey Dent had half of his face burned by the explosion that killed Rachel, transforming him into the villain Two-Face.

questions.text: Was Robert Downey Jr. in this movie?
options: He was only in a cameo
questions.explanation: Robert Downey Jr. played Tony Stark/Iron Man, and this was his final movie as the character. He sacrificed himself to save the universe.

questions.text: How did the Avengers travel back in time?
questions.explanation: Tony Stark discovered how to travel through time using the Quantum Realm and created special suits for the team.

options: She died to get the Soul Stone on Vormir
She was trapped in the past
questions.explanation: Black Widow sacrificed herself on Vormir to obtain the Soul Stone, which required the ultimate sacrifice - a soul for a soul.

questions.text: Who snapped their fingers to end Thanos?
questions.explanation: Iron Man took the Infinity Stones and snapped his fingers to eliminate Thanos and his army, sacrificing his own life in the process.

questions.text: What year did Avengers: Endgame take place?
questions.explanation: The movie takes place in 2023, five years after Thanos' snap, and the final battle marks the end of an era.

questions.text: Was Shameik Moore in this movie?
questions.explanation: Shameik Moore voiced Miles Morales, the main character who becomes the Spider-Man of his universe.

questions.text: How many different Spider-People appear in the movie?
questions.explanation: There are 6 Spider-People: Miles Morales, Peter B. Parker, Spider-Gwen, Spider-Man Noir, Spider-Ham, and Peni Parker.

questions.text: What happened to the original Peter Parker in Miles' universe?
options: He was trapped in another dimension
questions.explanation: The original Peter Parker was killed by the Kingpin during a fight, leaving the city without a Spider-Man.

options: Bring back his wife and son
questions.explanation: Kingpin wanted to use the collider to bring back his wife and son from another dimension, risking the destruction of all realities.

questions.text: What unique power did Miles develop?
questions.explanation: Miles developed the ability to turn invisible and generate electric shocks from his body, which he used to defeat Kingpin.
